api_list.name: Get App Details
api_list.description: Obtain all the data that is available for an specific app.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://steam-api7.p.rapidapi.com/appDetails/271590"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam-api7.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://steam-api7.p.rapidapi.com/appDetails/{appid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam-api7.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Supported Languages
api_list.description: Find out the languages supported by an app. The endpoint returns a list of available languages for the app, including options for voice and subtitles. The supported languages can be returned with or without HTML content.

api_list.name: Get Detailed Description
api_list.description: Get an in-depth description of an app using its appid. This endpoint provides a detailed narrative of the app, including key features and gameplay elements. The detailed description can be returned with or without HTML content.

api_list.name: Get About App
api_list.description: This endpoint delivers detailed information about the app, focusing on what the game is about. The about  App description can be returned with or without HTML content.

api_list.name: Get Short Description
api_list.description: Obtain a concise description of an app. By entering the appid, the API returns a brief overview or summary of the app. The short description can be returned with or without HTML content.

api_list.name: Get Videos
api_list.description: Access videos and trailers associated with an app. Provide the appid to receive URLs to video thumbnails, and direct links to video files in various formats.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://steam-api7.p.rapidapi.com/media/videos/271590"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam-api7.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Requirements
api_list.description: Get the system requirements for an app, including minimum and recommended specifications. This endpoint supports querying for PC, Mac, Linux, or all platforms. Also specify the type of requirements you wish to view (minimum, recommended, or all). The requirements can be returned with or without HTML content.

api_list.name: Total Apps Count
api_list.description: Provides the total number of applications currently registered in the database. This endpoint is helpful for getting a quick overview of the database size, indicating the total number of apps available.
api_list.code:

url = "https://steam-api7.p.rapidapi.com/totalApps"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam-api7.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: App Search
api_list.description: Search for apps by name. This endpoint allows you to input a search query and optionally specify the maximum number of results you wish to receive (default is 10, maximum is 50). It returns a list of apps whose names closely match the query, ordered by relevance. The response also includes the total number of matches found.

api_list.name: Get App ID by Name
api_list.description: Retrieve the unique application ID (appid) for a given app name. This endpoint is ideal for users who know the app name and need to fetch its corresponding ID. Simply pass the app name as a parameter, and the API will return the appid. The search is case-insensitive and supports multi-word app names.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://steam-api7.p.rapidapi.com/appid/Grand Theft Auto V"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam-api7.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://steam-api7.p.rapidapi.com/appid/{name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam-api7.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: App Autocomplete
api_list.description: Get quick app name suggestions based on a partial input. Ideal for implementing autocomplete features in your application. This endpoint returns app names that start with the provided text. You can also specify the number of suggestions (default and maximum limit is 1). It's useful for quickly finding an app name as the user types.

api_list.name: Get Name by App ID
api_list.description: Obtain the name of an application using its unique appid. Use this endpoint when you have an app's ID and need to find out the app's name. The endpoint expects an appid as the input parameter and returns the corresponding app name if found.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://steam-api7.p.rapidapi.com/name/271590"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam-api7.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
